ref: 6489 *dūta2 ʻ pained ʼ (dūda -- ʻ afflicting ʼ lex.). [Cf. dūná -- , duta -- ʻ pained ʼ Śiś., dūtaka -- m. ʻ name of Agni in the form of forest -- fire ʼ Gr̥hyaS. -- √du1]
